tasks.title: Fix Graph Traversal StopIteration Error
tasks.description: Resolve BFS algorithm StopIteration error in graph traversal
tasks.details:
- Error: neighbor_query_failed_bfs entity_id=2 error_type=StopIteration
- Location: src/adapters/sqlite3/graph/traversal.py
- Add proper exception handling for empty results in BFS

tasks.title: Fix LLM Query Processing JSON Parsing
tasks.description: Resolve JSON parsing failures in query analysis and expansion
tasks.details:
- Errors: 'Invalid JSON response', 'Invalid JSON' in query processing
- Add fallback handling for non-JSON LLM responses
- Improve error handling in domain services

tasks.title: Improve Transaction Context Error Handling

tasks.details:

- Improve error handling in transaction_context.py
